amendment.description: To set aside funding for dredging and other operation and maintenance of the Umpqua River, Oregon.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1653 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1653 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Wyden. (consideration: CR S11539-115444) To set aside funding for dredging and other operation and maintenance of the Umpqua River, Oregon.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1653 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1653 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Wyden.
